entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:04 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 1:09 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Friday: Fog. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
